h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: His most dangerous attack is a repeated spinning divebomb attack he can perform repeatedly to dash at you from all angles. Once you get the timing down, a Rock Solid deflection can stop him cold, or you can Cloud Step to the side and retaliate as he flies past.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
His most dangerous attack is a repeated spinning divebomb attack he can perform repeatedly to dash at you from all angles. Once you get the timing down, a Rock Solid deflection can stop him cold, or you can Cloud Step to the side and retaliate as he flies past.
